trans-unit.source: Add grok.View permissions to functional tests (requires grokcore.security 1.1)
trans-unit.target: 为功能测试添加grok.View权限(需要grokcore.security 1.1)。

trans-unit.source: Add validator to templatedir directive to disallow path separator.
trans-unit.target: 在templatedir指令中添加验证器,不允许使用路径分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Added AfterTraversalEvent which is fired after all traversal is done.
trans-unit.target: 添加了AfterTraversalEvent,它在所有遍历完成后被触发。

trans-unit.source: Back-ported the changes of the 1.13 branch related to the directory resource registration, using the latest ztk packages.
trans-unit.target: 使用最新的ztk包,回传了1.13分支中与目录资源注册相关的改动。

trans-unit.source: Base class for browser pages. Use the
trans-unit.target: 浏览器页面的基类。使用

trans-unit.source: Bring versions.cfg in line with current grok versions.cfg.

trans-unit.target: As páginas do navegador necessitam frequentemente de recursos estáticos adicionais como ficheiros CSS e JavaScript.Estes podem ser convenientemente colocados num directório chamado

trans-unit.source: Class-level directive that defines which layer the view is registered on. If not used, it defaults to the
trans-unit.target: 类级指令,定义视图注册在哪个层上。如果不使用,它默认为

trans-unit.source: Class-level directive that specifies the name a template file that’s associated with a view class, without the file extension. If not used, it defaults to the class’s name in lower case characters.

trans-unit.source: Create a PageTemplate object from a file.
trans-unit.target: 从文件中创建一个PageTemplate对象。

trans-unit.source: Default layer for browser components from
trans-unit.target: 浏览器组件的默认层从

trans-unit.source: Directive used on a layer interface to register it as skin using a human-readable name (
trans-unit.target: 在图层界面上使用的指令,使用一个人类可读的名称将其注册为皮肤(
在DirectoryResource注册中使用的Directove指向一个非包目录(层次结构),其中包含图片、css文件等资源。

trans-unit.source: Don’t register a ‘static’ resource directory if the ‘static’ directory does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果“静态”目录不存在，请不要注册“静态”资源目录。

trans-unit.source: Factor out a base template grokker that associate templates for viewish components.
trans-unit.target: 因素出一个基础模板grokker,为viewish组件关联模板。

trans-unit.source: Factor out generally useful methods and properties for view-ish components into components.ViewSupport mixin.
trans-unit.target: 将一般有用的视图类组件的方法和属性因子到组件.ViewSupport mixin中。

trans-unit.source: Fix a test that relied on older zope.testbrowser behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 修复了一个依赖于旧版zope.testbrowser行为的测试。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug where zope.browserpage was not correctly declared as a dependency.
trans-unit.target: 修复了zope.browserpage没有正确声明为依赖关系的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix how the static resource are found. Instead of using as name the package name where the component is defined, using as name the package where the template for the component is defined, or the base component. This is done by setting an attribute
trans-unit.target: 修正静态资源的查找方式。不再使用定义组件的包名作为名称,而是使用定义组件模板的包名,或者基础组件。这是通过设置一个属性

trans-unit.source: Fix needed for grokcore.formlib: allow a base_method’ed render() on view. This allows grokcore.formlib to have a render() in addition to a template.
trans-unit.target: 修复grokcore.formlib所需的问题：允许在视图上使用base_method的render（）。这允许grokcore.formlib除了模板之外还具有render（）。

trans-unit.source: Fix the factory for subdirectories of the DirectoryResource implementation by using hooks in zope.app.publisher.browser.directoryresource.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用zope.app.publisher.browser.directoryresource中的钩子来修复DirectoryResource实现的子目录的工厂。

trans-unit.source: Fix the template registry and grokker for views to let View and other components using View as base class to be associated with a template directly by setting it as ‘template’ attribute on the view class. Example:
trans-unit.target: 通过将视图的基类设置为'template'属性，可修复视图的模板注册表和grokker，以使使用View作为基类的View和其他组件直接与模板关联。例：

trans-unit.source: Fix the url() function to behave properly while passed an empty data dict.
trans-unit.target: 修正url()函数在传递空数据时表现正确。

trans-unit.source: Fix the url() method to accept the “status” and “trusted” arguments, passed on to the redirect method on the response object.
trans-unit.target: 修复url（）方法以接受传递给响应对象上的redirect方法的“ status”和“ trusted”参数。

trans-unit.source: Fixed launchpad bug #395061 : removed the default_fallback_to_name function. It can be imported from
trans-unit.target: 修正了launchpad bug #395061:删除了default_fallback_to_name函数。它可以从

trans-unit.target: 生成一个对象的URL,并附加一个可选的视图名称。视图的

trans-unit.source: Grok-like configuration for Zope browser pages
trans-unit.target: 类似于Grok的Zope浏览器页面配置

trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们利用了隐式名称功能。该课程将作为

trans-unit.source: If you then wanted to define a skin, simply inherit from all the layer interfaces that should be in the skin and use the
trans-unit.target: 如果你想定义一个皮肤,只需继承所有应该在皮肤中的层接口,并使用

trans-unit.source: Ignore ‘<tpl>.cache’ files when looking up template files in a template dir. Fix bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/grok/+bug/332747
trans-unit.target: 在模板目录中查找模板文件时，请忽略“ <tpl> .cache”文件。修复错误https://bugs.launchpad.net/grok/+bug/332747

trans-unit.source: Improve error message when a template is required for a component but cannot be found (Fix Launchpad issue #225855, #242698).
trans-unit.target: 改进当一个组件需要模板但无法找到时的错误信息(修复Launchpad问题#225855,#242698)。

trans-unit.source: Improve error message when a templatedir() directive points to a non- existent directory. (fix launchpad issue 680528).
trans-unit.target: 改进 templatedir()指令指向一个不存在的目录时的错误信息。(修复启动板问题680528)。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the very convenient “static resources”, one can use more explicitly configured and flexible DirectoryResource components. DirectoryResource component allow for differentiating resources based on layers and names and provide a way to register resources in one package and make use of these resources in another package’s views:
trans-unit.target: 除了非常方便的“静态资源”之外，还可以使用配置更明确，更灵活的DirectoryResource组件。DirectoryResource组件允许根据层和名称区分资源，并提供一种在一个包中注册资源并在另一个包的视图中使用这些资源的方法：

trans-unit.source: In the template directory grokker, ignore directories and files without extensions.
trans-unit.target: 在模板目录grokker中,忽略没有扩展名的目录和文件。

trans-unit.source: Inherited grok.template() information is looked up against the module of the view class that uses the grok.template() directive. This allows for subclassing view components that use the grok.template() directive from other packages.
trans-unit.target: 继承的grok.template()信息是根据使用grok.template()指令的视图类的模块来查找的。这允许从其他包中子类化使用grok.template()指令的视图组件。

trans-unit.source: Made package comply to zope.org repository policy.
trans-unit.target: 使软件包符合zope.org仓库政策。

trans-unit.source: Make it possible to instantiate an ungrokked view by being slightly more defensive in __init__. This makes it easier to write unit tests.
trans-unit.target: 通过在__init__中略微增加防御性,使实例化一个非grokked视图成为可能。这使得编写单元测试更加容易。

trans-unit.source: Make possible to disable the template warning with the help of the
trans-unit.target: 可以借助以下功能来禁用模板警告
合并对全局模板注册表的支持，该注册表可删除有关“共享”模板目录中未关联模板的不必要警告。

trans-unit.source: Module-level directive that tells the template machinery which directory to look in for templates that should associated with views in a particular module. If not used, it defaults to
trans-unit.target: 模块级指令,告诉模板机制在哪个目录下寻找应该与特定模块中的视图关联的模板。如果不使用,它默认为

trans-unit.source: Of course, more than often a view should render HTML which you would construct using some sort of templating engine.
trans-unit.target: É claro que,mais do que muitas vezes,uma vista deve renderizar HTML que se constrói utilizando algum tipo de motor de templates.

trans-unit.source: Page template reloading now also works for macros. Fixes https://bugs.launchpad.net/grok/+bug/162261.
trans-unit.target: 页面模板重新加载现在也适用于宏。修复了 https://bugs.launchpad.net/grok/+bug/162261。

trans-unit.source: Put the first line somewhere near the top of your root ZCML file (but below the line where you include
trans-unit.target: Coloque a primeira linha algures perto do topo do seu ficheiro ZCML de raiz (mas abaixo da linha onde inclui

trans-unit.source: Rearrange tests such that Travis CI can pick up all functional tests too.
trans-unit.target: 重新安排测试,使Travis CI也能接收到所有的功能测试。

trans-unit.source: Removed the static directory grokker in order to make way for using fanstatic.
trans-unit.target: 删除了静态目录grokker,以便为使用fanstatic让路。

trans-unit.source: Return either an encoded 8-bit string or a unicode string. The method can take arbitrary keyword parameters which are filled from request values. If not implemented, a template is looked up in the template dir instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个8位编码的字符串或一个unicode字符串。本方法可以接受任意关键字参数,这些参数由请求值填充。如果没有实现,则会在模板目录下查找模板。

trans-unit.source: Revert dependency from zope.container back to zope.app.container.

Revert the splitting CodeView/View. The original reasons for the split have been obsoleted by the recent martain developments regarding inheritted module level directives. At the same time the split up components proved cumbersome to use and a too big a change between the 1.0a and 1.0b releases of Grok.
trans-unit.target: 把拆分CodeView/View的做法改过来。由于最近关于继承模块级指令的发展,拆分的最初原因已经过时了。同时,拆分后的组件使用起来很麻烦,而且在Grok的1.0a和1.0b版本之间变化太大。

trans-unit.source: Reverted change to checkTemplates: for some formlib edge cases it detects the right templates again.
trans-unit.target: 撤销了对checkTemplates的修改:对于一些formlib边缘情况,它再次检测到正确的模板。

trans-unit.source: Simplify the DirectoryResource and DirectoryResourceFactory implementations by making better use of the hook points provided by zope.app.publisher.browser.directoryresource.
trans-unit.target: 通过更好地利用zope.app.publisher.browser.directoryresource提供的钩子点,简化DirectoryResource和DirectoryResourceFactory的实现。

trans-unit.source: Splitted CodeView out of View. View only uses templates, CodeView only uses a render() method. So views that have a render method must subclass from CodeView instead of View (that should be the only change needed).
trans-unit.target: 将CodeView从View中分离出来。View只使用模板,CodeView只使用render()方法。所以有render方法的view必须从CodeView而不是View中子类出来(这应该是唯一需要改变的地方)。

trans-unit.target: Tal página de utilização de modelos é uma subclasse de

trans-unit.source: That means that by default no warnings are emitted anymore (while errors will still appear).
trans-unit.target: 这意味着默认情况下不会再发出警告(而错误仍会出现)。

trans-unit.source: The custom zope publication has now moved from the grok package to grokcore.view. The registration of the publication is optional, and is used by grok and the grokcore.json package.
trans-unit.target: 自定义zope出版物现在已经从grok包移到了grokcore.view中。出版物的注册是可选的,由 grok 和 grokcore.json 包使用。

trans-unit.source: The response attribute needs to be available in CodeView as well.

trans-unit.source: Up the version requirement for grokcore.security to 1.2.
Update APIs interfaces to include the new
Use 1.0b1 versions.cfg in Grok’s release info instead of a local copy; a local copy for all grokcore packages is just too hard to maintain.
trans-unit.target: 在Grok的发行信息中使用1.0b1版本.cfg，而不要使用本地副本；所有grokcore软件包的本地副本都很难维护。

trans-unit.source: Use an update martian and grokcore.component.
Use the component registration api in grokcore.component.

Use the zope configuration action ordering feature to have templates registered for all packages and modules, before trying to associate the templates. Checking for unassociated templates is done very very late in the configuration action order.
trans-unit.target: 使用zope配置动作排序功能,在尝试关联模板之前,所有包和模块都要注册模板。检查未关联的模板是在配置动作排序的很晚才进行的。

trans-unit.source: View components will now again behave like it did up until the latest alpha release of Grok.

trans-unit.source: method. This allows for computing URLs on a specific skin. Note that it is not verified whether the computed URL actually exist on the specified skin.
trans-unit.target: 方法。这允许计算特定皮肤上的URL。请注意,它不会验证计算出的URL是否真的存在于指定的皮肤上。

trans-unit.source: module containing the grokkers has been split in a package with separate modules for the view, template, skin and static resources grokkers. This allows applications to use only grokkers they need (and maybe redefine others).
trans-unit.target: 包含grokkers的模块已经被分割成一个包,其中包含视图、模板、皮肤和静态资源grokkers的独立模块。这使得应用程序可以只使用他们需要的grokkers(也许还可以重新定义其他模块)。

trans-unit.source: now accepts strings that will be used as skin name as possible alternative to a skin interface.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以接受将作为皮肤名称的字符串,作为皮肤界面的可能替代品。

trans-unit.source: on the component that specify which resource directory should be used. This fix missing resources when you extend the component and don’t redefined the template.
trans-unit.target: 在指定应使用哪个资源目录的组件上。当您扩展组件并且不重新定义模板时，此修复程序会丢失资源。

trans-unit.source: or lower. This can be done in Python or via a logging conf file, for instance in the .ini files of regular grokprojects. See the Python standard lib
trans-unit.target: 或更低。这可以在Python中完成,也可以通过日志记录conf文件完成,例如在常规grokprojects的.ini文件中。参见Python标准的lib

trans-unit.source: that let you configure which template filename pattern should be ignored by the template registry. The pattern attribute of the directive accepts regular expresssion that will be matched against the (template) file extension.
trans-unit.target: 让你配置模板注册表应该忽略哪些模板文件名模式。该指令的模式属性接受正则表达式,将与(模板)文件扩展名进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: to look up and render a given content provider.
trans-unit.target: 来查找和呈现给定的内容提供者。

trans-unit.target: 变量的模板。该方法可以接受任意的关键字参数,这些参数由请求值填充。
